entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
